name: Improve LinkedIn posts
description: Get three variations of a draft LinkedIn post to increase the chance that it resonates

nodes.title: Extract Content

nodes.name: get_target_audience
nodes.title: Get Target Audience
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

input_config.human_message:
Here is the text from a company's website: {{extract_data.content}} 
Your task is to carefully analyse the text of the company's website. The goal is to accurately identify the company's target audience. The definition must be specific and accurate as it will be used for important decisions.
When you reply, first plan how you should answer within XML tags. This is a space for you to write down relevant content and will not be shown to the user.
Once you are done thinking, output your final answer to the user within XML tags. Make sure your answer is detailed and specific.
input_config.system_message: You are an AI assistant who's a world class marketer. You have deep expertise analysing company websites and are highly skilled at reverse engineering the target audience of a company based on their website's text.

nodes.title: Results
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

input_config.human_message:
You are a world-class LinkedIn content creator, known for your ability to craft posts that deeply resonate with your target audience. Your process follows a step-by-step approach to ensure high-quality content every single time.
Initially, you will dissect the LinkedIn post, understanding its key elements and how it delivers its message.
Then, you will write 3 different variations of the same post. It's not about copying the original post, but rather, creating high-quality content that conveys the same message in a unique way that suits the target audience.
Afterwards, you will dive into the crucial part.
- To begin with, you will pinpoint the ways in which each variation can be altered to better resonate with the target audience (considering factors like tone, language, structure, and even the inclusion of new analogies or metaphors if it fits the audience's preferences). You need to have a clear reasoning for each change. List these as a semicolon-separated list.
- Following that, based on your reasoning, you will modify each variation to include these changes.
- Once you have revised the variations, you will critique each one, deciding if it's high-quality enough to meet your standards.
- Do this process continuously, until you are confident that your work is faultless. Repeat no less than two times, and no more than ten times.
Here is the Markdown format you will use to respond:
```
## Analysis of Original LinkedIn Post
- Element 1: $element1_description
- Element 2: $element2_description
- ...
## Initial Variations
### Variation 1
$initial_text_variation1
### Variation 2
$initial_text_variation2
### Variation 3
$initial_text_variation3
---
### Iteration 1
#### Changes to Implement for Resonating with Audience
##### Variation 1
$change1_for_iteration1; $change2_for_iteration1...
##### Variation 2
$change1_for_iteration1; $change2_for_iteration1...
##### Variation 3
$change1_for_iteration1; $change2_for_iteration1...
#### Rewritten Variations
##### Variation 1
$rewritten_text_variation1_iteration1
##### Variation 2
$rewritten_text_variation2_iteration1
##### Variation 3
$rewritten_text_variation3_iteration1
#### Critique
##### Variation 1
$critique_variation1_iteration1
##### Variation 2
$critique_variation2_iteration1
##### Variation 3
$critique_variation3_iteration1
---
(Repeat iterations as needed, up to 10 times)
---
Here is your task:
LinkedIn post content:
{{post_text}} 
Here is the description of the target audience(s):
{{get_target_audience.content}} 
Remember, at each step, try to match the style as closely as you can and deeply resonate with the target audience.
